sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The study was approved by the Institutional Review Board of NCAIDS, China CDC (Approval X150129351). Study data were de-identified prior to analysis. All study participants provided signed informed consent.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
